m_szDocTitle: Groundbreaking hydrogen-powered car to be displayed at London Motor Show - Cyprus Mail Cyprus Mail
m_szDocSumamry: Groundbreaking hydrogen-powered car to be displayed at London Motor Show Groundbreaking hydrogen-powered car to be displayed at London Motor Show March 20th, 2016 The Riversimple RASA is a lightweight and highly efficient 'network' electric car powered by innovative hydrogen fuel cell technology. The first road-legal, engineering prototype will be on display at the London Motor Show in the Evolution Centre Related post... An innovative two-seater hydrogen cell powered car, developed and built in Wales, will be displayed at the new London Motor Show to be staged in Battersea Park from May 5th t
